entry.title: ab-sc4t/VeriCrypt: An npm package for secure cryptographic operations using Ed25519 for signing and X25519 for encryption. Easily generate key pairs, sign/verify messages, and encrypt/decrypt data with modern, efficient algorithms. Built on noble-curves for fast, lightweight cryptography.
entry.content: An npm package for secure cryptographic operations using Ed25519 for signing and X25519 for encryption. Easily generate key pairs, sign/verify messages, and encrypt/decrypt data with modern, efficient algorithms. Built on noble-curves for fast, lightweight cryptography.
